mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_email as userEmail, user_name as userName, user_password as userPassword, user_number as userNumber, user_birth as userBirth, user_title as userTitle, user_dept as userDept, user_photo as userPhoto from user where user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName}, user_dept = #{userDept}, user_title = #{userTitle}, user_number = #{userNumber}, user_birth = #{userBirth}, user_photo = #{userPhoto} where user_no = #{userNo}
